definitions.definition: Emotionally hardened ; unfeeling and indifferent to the suffering / feelings of others .
examples: She was so callous that she could criticise a cancer patient for wearing a wig.

definitions.definition: Having calluses , or relating to calluses.

main_definition: ( figurative ) Emotionally hardened ; unfeeling and indifferent to the suffering / feelings of others .
secondary_definitions: ( literal ) Having calluses , or relating to calluses.
